title: Inazuma Eleven: Ares no Tenbin
overview: Inazuma Eleven: Ares no Tenbin is set during the same time period as the original Inazuma Eleven TV anime. It is a parallel world story that takes place shortly after the events of the Football Frontier championship. The new series will focus on a trio of new protagonists: Ryouhei Haizaki, Asuto Inamori and Yuuma Nosaka.
